_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Garrys Mod X64 Github
author: owner@katsuki0.cc
description: Garrys Mod, is a sandbox physics game created by Garry Newman, and developed by his company, Facepunch Studios.
startup: `if [[ -d .git ]] && [[ {{AUTO_GIT_UPDATE}} == "1" ]]; then git pull; fi;` ./srcds_run_x64 -game garrysmod -console -port {{SERVER_PORT}} +ip 0.0.0.0 +host_workshop_collection {{WORKSHOP_ID}} +map {{SRCDS_MAP}} +gamemode {{GAMEMODE}} -strictportbind -norestart +sv_setsteamaccount {{STEAM_ACC}} +maxplayers {{MAX_PLAYERS}}  -tickrate {{TICKRATE}}  $( [ "$LUA_REFRESH" == "1" ] || printf %s '-disableluarefresh' )

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# steamcmd Base Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

# Install git and others
apt-get update
apt install -y git curl jq file unzip

git version

export PATH="$PATH:/mnt/server/garrysmod/.git"
export PATH="$PATH:/mnt/server/.git"
echo $PATH


## just in case someone removed the defaults.
if [ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]; then
    echo -e "steam user is not set.\n"
    echo -e "Using anonymous user.\n"
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
else
    echo -e "user set to ${STEAM_USER}"
fi

## download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps # Fix steamcmd disk write error when this folder is missing
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

## install game using steamcmd
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} $( [[ "${WINDOWS_INSTALL}" == "1" ]] && printf %s '+@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows' ) +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} -beta x86-64 ${EXTRA_FLAGS} validate +quit ## other flags may be needed depending on install. looking at you cs 1.6

## set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

# set up css content
if [ "${AUTO_CSS}" == "true" ] || [ "${AUTO_CSS}" == "1" ]; then
    echo -e "Installing css content..."
    
    cd /mnt/server/
    curl -sSL -o css.tar.gz http://mail.bogserv.fr/content/css.tar.gz
    tar -xzvf css.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/
    rm -f css.tar.gz
    
    cd /mnt/server/garrysmod/cfg
    echo '
    
    //
    // Use this file to mount additional paths to the filesystem
    // The folder you provide must contain either one or more *_dir.vpk files or the usual models/materials/etc folders
    // Lines starting with // are comments and are ignored by the game
    // This file will also affect Hammer Editor (hammer.exe)
    //
    
    // DO NOT add a slash to the end of the filename
    // DO NOT start lines with // in between { and }, the 2 lines there are commented out examples and will be ignored by the game
    
    "mountcfg"
    {
        "cstrike"	"/home/container/css/cstrike"
    //	"tf"		"C:\mytf2server\tf"
    }
    
    // DO NOT start lines with // in between { and }, the 2 lines there are commented out examples and will be ignored by the game
    ' > mount.cfg
fi

# Creating needed default files for the game
cd /mnt/server/garrysmod/lua/autorun/server
echo '
-- Docs: https://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/resource/AddWorkshop
-- Place the ID of the workshop addon you want to be downloaded to people who join your server, not the collection ID
-- Use https://beta.configcreator.com/create/gmod/resources.lua to easily create a list based on your collection ID

resource.AddWorkshop( "" )
' > workshop.lua

cd /mnt/server/garrysmod/cfg
echo '
// Please do not set RCon in here, use the startup parameters.

hostname		"Hosted by risingproject.ru"
sv_password		""
sv_loadingurl   ""
sv_downloadurl  ""

// Steam Server List Settings
// sv_location "eu"
sv_region "255"
sv_lan "0"
sv_max_queries_sec_global "30000"
sv_max_queries_window "45"
sv_max_queries_sec "5"

// Server Limits
sbox_maxprops		100
sbox_maxragdolls	5
sbox_maxnpcs		10
sbox_maxballoons	10
sbox_maxeffects		10
sbox_maxdynamite	10
sbox_maxlamps		10
sbox_maxthrusters	10
sbox_maxwheels		10
sbox_maxhoverballs	10
sbox_maxvehicles	20
sbox_maxbuttons		10
sbox_maxsents		20
sbox_maxemitters	5
sbox_godmode		0
sbox_noclip		    0

// Network Settings - Please keep these set to default.

sv_minrate		75000
sv_maxrate		0
gmod_physiterations	2
net_splitpacket_maxrate	45000
decalfrequency		12 

// Execute Ban Files - Please do not edit
exec banned_ip.cfg 
exec banned_user.cfg 

// Add custom lines under here
' > server.cfg

cd /mnt/server/
# ^ Без этой хуйни сверху, не работает хуйня снизу.


if [ "${AUTO_INSTALL}" == "false" ] || [ "${AUTO_INSTALL}" == "0" ]; then
    echo -e "skip auto repository install"
    exit 0
fi

if [[ ${GIT_ADDRESS} != *.git ]]; then
    GIT_ADDRESS=${GIT_ADDRESS}.git
fi

if [ -z "${USERNAME}" ] && [ -z "${ACCESS_TOKEN}" ]; then
    echo -e "using anon api call"
else
    GIT_ADDRESS="https://${USERNAME}:${ACCESS_TOKEN}@$(echo -e ${GIT_ADDRESS} | cut -d/ -f3-)"
fi

if [ "${GIT_FOLDER}" == "" ]; then
    echo -e "git folder not set.\n"
    echo -e "Using main folder.\n"
    GIT_FOLDER="/mnt/server"
else
    echo -e "Set git folder to - /mnt/server/${GIT_FOLDER}"
    GIT_FOLDER="/mnt/server/${GIT_FOLDER}"
fi

cd ${GIT_FOLDER}

if [ "$(ls -A ${GIT_FOLDER})" ]; then
    echo -e "${GIT_FOLDER} directory is not empty."
    if [ -d .git ]; then
        echo -e ".git directory exists"
        if [ -f .git/config ]; then
            echo -e "loading info from git config"
            ORIGIN=$(git config --get remote.origin.url)
        else
            echo -e "files found with no git config"
            echo -e "closing out without touching things to not break anything"
            exit 10
        fi
    else
        echo "cloning repository by trick"
        git init .
        git remote add -t \* -f origin ${GIT_ADDRESS}
        if [ -z ${BRANCH} ]; then
            echo -e "cloning default branch"
            git checkout -f
        else
            echo -e "cloning ${BRANCH}'"
            git checkout -f ${BRANCH}
            git pull
        fi
    fi

    if [ "${ORIGIN}" == "${GIT_ADDRESS}" ]; then
        echo "pulling latest from git"
        git pull
    fi
else # По идее папка вообще не может быть пуста TODO
    echo -e "${GIT_FOLDER} is empty.\ncloning files into repo"
    if [ -z ${BRANCH} ]; then
        echo -e "cloning default branch"
        git clone ${GIT_ADDRESS} .
    else
        echo -e "cloning ${BRANCH}'"
        git clone --single-branch --branch ${BRANCH} ${GIT_ADDRESS} .
    fi
fi
